Static Private Attributes

  • const uint32 m_timeBetweenSMS = 1000
    The delay between sending SMS:s so that the telephone won't be so surprised when a new SMS is on its way in.

Detailed Description

GM12SMSTalker.

SMSTalker for GM12 and GC25 telephones.

Definition at line 29 of file GM12SMSTalker.h.

bool GM12SMSTalker::waitForEvent (  ModemParserResult::result_t  result  )  [private]
 

Compares result to the first result in the eventQueue.

Parameters:
result The result to wait for.
Returns:
True if the result was what we were waiting for. False if the result was something else or there was a timeout.
